Class DropwizardConfiguredEnsembleProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datasift.dropwizard.curator.ensemble.DropwizardConfiguredEnsembleProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EnsembleProvider, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class DropwizardConfiguredEnsembleProvider
extends Object
implements EnsembleProvider
    An EnsembleProvider for a fixed ensemble, configured by a ZooKeeperConfiguration.
